title: Stealthy Hiders
text: Hiders remain invisible for longer durations.

title: Smaller Levels
text: The level size is reduced, making it more challenging to navigate.

title: +1 Enemy per Level
text: Each level will have one additional enemy.

title: +2 Enemies per Level
text: Each level will have two additional enemies.

title: +3 Enemies per Level
text: Each level will have three additional enemies.

title: Labyrinthine
text: Levels have more complex and maze-like structures.

title: Bouncing Tanks
text: Tank enemies now bounce off walls, making them unpredictable.

title: Toxic Trail
text: Enemies leave a toxic trail behind, damaging the player on contact.
